text: Adriaan Ludick (born ) is a Namibian rugby union player for South African side the in the Currie Cup and the Rugby Challenge. His regular position is lock. Ludick made his international debut for in 2018, in their end-of-year match against in Krasnodar. ==References== Category:Namibian rugby union players Category:Living people Category:1998 births Category:Rugby union locks Category:Boland Cavaliers players Category:Namibia international rugby union players
title: Adriaan Ludick
